name: Anime Recommendations Database
data_intro: This data set contains information on user preference data from 73,516 users on 12,294 anime. Each user is able to add anime to their completed list and give it a rating and this data set is a compilation of those ratings.

cat_feature_intro.name: - name - full name of anime.
cat_feature_intro.genre: - genre - comma separated list of genres for this anime.
cat_feature_intro.episodes: - episodes - how many episodes in this show. (1 if movie).

num_feature_intro.anime_id: - anime_id - the anime that this user has rated.
num_feature_intro.rating: Thanks to myanimelist.net API for providing anime data and user ratings.
num_feature_intro.members: - members - number of community members that are in this anime's
num_feature_intro.user_id: - user_id - non identifiable randomly generated user id.
